entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
